beer.beer_description: This ale was developed by our Managing Director & Chief Brewer Dr Tim Cooper. With its subtle fruity notes and balanced use of bittering hops, Dr Tim’s can be enjoyed at all occasions. The slight cloudiness evident is from the yeast which is carried through the fermentation and produces the natural carbonation. Naturally brewed like all Cooper’s Ales, it is packaged into a specially designed can which allows the natural flavours to consistently develop during the secondary fermentation.

items.badge_description: Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 20 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 5!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 15 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 4.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 130 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 85 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 18!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 35 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 140 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 29!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 15 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 4.
